description: This Kotlin source file defines the NoteRepository class, which acts as a repository layer abstracting database access for Note objects via a DAO (Data Access Object). It provides methods for CRUD operations in an Android application context.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: A repository class that encapsulates data access logic for Note objects, providing simple methods for CRUD operations to the rest of the application.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all Note objects from the database.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note object by its ID; returns null if not found.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new Note into the database; returns its generated ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Note; returns the number of affected rows.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Note by its ID; returns the number of affected rows.
